properties.entry: INSERT INTO TBL_MENU (EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DAE, ENT_YN) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET PHONE = ? ,EMAIL = ? ,DEPT_CODE = ? ,SALARY = ? ,BONUS = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
SELECT E.* FROM EMPLOYEE E WHERE E.EMP_ID = ?
